section.name: Pre-requisite
section.p:
In order to install Silverpeas you need some tools installed.
Currently Silverpeas V5 has been tested and can be automatically deployed on a pre-configured version of JBoss 4.0.3. But it has been successfully deployed and run on other Application Servers (such as Websphere, Weblogic, ect.).

subsection.name: Java 6
subsection.p: Silverpeas needs a JDK at least of version 6, which can be downloaded from Sun here

subsection.name: Apache Maven
subsection.p:
Apache Maven 2.2.x is used in Silverpeas to build its components and to assembly it. So you need to install it on your target platform.
To install it correctly you can follow the instructions from Maven - The Definitive Guide
For more information about Apache Maven you can go to their website or download the ebook

subsection.name: Postgresql
subsection.p: Silverpeas can use any JDBC compliant RDBMS but the opensource solution is pre-configured to run on PostgreSQL 8.x. You can download it from their website.
You will have to create a database SilverpeasV5 with a user postgres/postgres with administrative rights. You can use pgAdmin to hepl you create such a database.

subsection.name: Installing JBoss
subsection.p: Currently we provide a packaged and pre-configured version of JBoss 4.0.3 for Windows that can be downloaded here.
You have to set-up the environment variable %JBOSS_HOME% to the directory in which you have unzipped the jboss403.zip

subsection.name: Preparing Silverpeas
subsection.p: Currently we provide a packaged and pre-configured version that will build Silverpeas and its database: here.
Unzip it on any directory, then define an environment variable $SILVERPEAS_HOME that points to this directory.
Suppose you have unzipped the production.zip into C:\Silverpeas\production then %SILVERPEAS_HOME% should be C:\Silverpeas\production.
You have to configure your installation by editing the files %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\setup\settings\A200003Settings.xml and %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\setup\settings\SilverpeasSettings.xml.

subsection.name: Deploying Silverpeas
subsection.p: This is a 4 step operation in %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\silverpeas\bin:

subsection.name: Launching Silverpeas
subsection.p: In %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\silverpeas\bin you can launch Silverpeas with silverpeas_start_jboss.cmd.
In %SILVERPEAS_HOME%\silverpeas\bin you can stop Silverpeas with silverpeas_stop_jboss.cmd.
